meals.name: American pancakes
meals.Description: Easy, American-style, fluffy pancakes are great for feeding a crowd at breakfast or brunch. Top with something sweet like fruit, jam or syrup, or rashers of crispy bacon.

meals.name: Eggy cheese crumpets
meals.Description: Swap your regular toast or sandwiches at lunch or breakfast time for these delicious eggy cheese crumpets. Enjoy with cherry tomatoes and sliced avocado.

meals.name: Ratatouille
meals.Description: Enjoy this super-healthy traditional ratatouille recipe for lunch or dinner, safe in the knowledge that it counts as four of your five-a-day

meals.name: Turkey tikka masala
meals.Description: Crave spice after the traditional Christmas lunch? Want to turn your leftover turkey into a whole new dish? This tasty turkey tikka masala is for you

meals.name: Dad's special supper
meals.Description: CA meaty and satisfying meal, perfect for Father's Day

meals.name: Easy banana muffins
meals.Description: Make these moreish banana muffins for an easy breakfast or a snack on the go. They're also great for lunchboxes and will prove popular with the whole family.
meals.ingredients: 250g self-raising flour,1 tsp baking powder,½ tsp bicarbonate of soda,110g caster sugar,75g butter, melted,1 tsp vanilla extract,2 eggs,2 large ripe bananas, mashed,125ml buttermilk (or add 1 tsp of lemon juice to milk and leave for 20 mins),50g pecans choppedpl us extra to decorate (optional)

meals.name: Homemade chicken nachos
meals.Description: A super-quick Mexican snack to enjoy with a Margarita or three
meals.ingredients: 200g plain corn tortilla chips,2 cooked chicken breasts shredded into small pieces,6 spring onions ,140g red leicester cheese,1 small jar red or green sliced pickled jalapeño peppers,small bunch coriander,hot pepper sauce (like Chipolte Tabasco)
meals.directions: Heat oven to 200C/180C fan/gas 6. Layer up the tortilla chips in an ovenproof dish or baking tray with the chopped chicken spring onions cheese and pickled jalapeños. Bake for 8 mins or until the cheese is melted.,To serve sprinkle with the coriander and eat with your favourite accompaniments.

meals.name: Bicerin - coffee & chocolate drink
meals.Description: This is a luxurious coffee-and-chocolate drink topped with cream that originates from a cafe in Turin where it is a closely guarded secret

meals.name: Jessica rabbit cocktail
meals.Description: Plenty of fresh ingredients lift this simple mezcal cocktail to create a sweet, light and wonderfully balanced drink
